DOC.brief_summary: To compare outcome laparoscopic pyelolithotomy percutaneous nephrolithotomy patient > 3cm renal pelvis stone .
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Pyelolithotomy Versus Percutaneous Nephrolothotomy Management > 3cm Renal Pelvis Stone
DOC.criteria: Adults > 3cm renal pelvis stone History previous surgery target kidney Active UTI Coagulopathy
